mng: to long for, to wish, to cling to, to stick to, sth that sticks, close to, next to, spread open, informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4], bar (unit of pressure), nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan), abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing, surname Ba, abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian, abbr. for Pakistan

exm.mng: Ali Baba, character from The Arabian Nights
Ba Jin (1904-2005), novelist, author of the trilogy 家, 春, 秋
